result.arabic_text: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: 163. Jannatti maray Yalli kicnim kataate Yallih xaqul usun aroocal ittak muxxu taanah, gira maray Yalli niqbim kataate girah Addal Aroocal ittak muxxutaanah, Yalli usun taamoomik Abba haanam yabali kinni.
